definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
to read a book/to study/to attend school
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
(technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]

sentences.english: This book is suffused with Shaw's characteristic wry Irish humour.
sentences.chinese: 這本書充滿了蕭伯納獨特的愛爾蘭式幽默與嘲諷。

sentences.english: In Love + Sex With Robots, Levy explains how human-robot love can become a reality.
sentences.chinese: Levy在書中說人與機器間的愛情可以成爲現實。

sentences.english: Dreyman: I specifically said no books.
sentences.chinese: 特定的我提醒過不要書。

sentences.english: The books and journal were informative.
sentences.chinese: 那些書和日記信息量很足。

sentences.english: Remember what we read from I Cor 15?
sentences.chinese: 記得我們在哥林多前書15章所讀過的嗎？

sentences.english: The books are in orderly rows on the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 書整齊有序地排列在書架上。

sentences.english: He suggested them read at least one book on the legal rights.
sentences.chinese: 他建議他們至少閱讀一本關於法定權利的書。

sentences.english: Mr. Anderson was writing a book on the history of Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 安得森先生正在寫一本關於丹麥歷史的書。

sentences.english: "Is the book in artistic binding?" asked Joe.
Yang is still looking for a book publisher.
sentences.chinese: 目前，楊雅晴仍在尋找書的出版商。

sentences.english: Oh, and tell therm we want it small enough to fit on a book cover.
sentences.chinese: 哦，告訴他們要小一點，要能夠放在書的封面上。

sentences.english: In the book of the space.
A study plan written in Chinese.
A Roget's Thesaurus will do the trick, as will any number of vocabulary building books.
sentences.chinese: 一本羅熱辭典或者其它詞彙書就可以幫你做到這一點。

sentences.english: A half-written ebook is no good to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 寫到一半的書對誰都沒有好處。

definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
